attributes.action: Totally reform the political system to allow a more focussed running of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The EU referendum sent a clear message for change to the Government.  

We have been poorly represented in the EU (by the likes of Mr Farage that wanted the relationship to fail!) and now our leaders are resigning because they have no idea what to do next.

I vote for no confidence in our political system - there isn't a successful business in the world that is run like a government.

I want Whitehall to consider alternatives on how we can run the UK - for me, the time of the Politician is over!
attributes.background:
I am unhappy with the way Government represents us. Our politicians spend more time bemoaning the opposition than doing their jobs.  The current political system doesn’t seem fit for purpose anymore.  We need change.

Government must consider alternatives and allow a vote for meaningful change.

rejection.details: Please explain the reform you want the Government or Parliament to deliver.
